message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we'll both go home happy.
Alice, let's be realistic. I'm offering you a fair 300,000$. Time is running out, and it's only going to get worse for me.
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'm offering you a deal you can't refuse - but my patience is wearing thin.
Alice, this is a serious offer.  We're both losing out the longer this goes on.  Let's end this now with a win-win.
Okay, Bob, last chance. Take this offer or I walk.  Don't let greed cloud your judgement.
